text: Requirement: C++ compilers, Rcpp, RcppArmadillo, sf install package, please use command . assumes users installed remotes pak packages:

title: Spatially Enhanced and Entropy-Derived Contiguity Matrix (SpEED)
text: Calculating Hadamard product Jensen-Shannon divergence matrix geographic distance matrix control geographic confounding Emulates exact matching, mixed variables Actual matching procedure done https://github.com/kouskeimai/MatchIt Inspired https://github.com/gpapadog/DAPSm

title: Jensen-Shannon divergence — distJSD
text: Computes Jensen-Shannon divergence, based Kullback-Leibler divergence. deq(JSD(||B)=12 ( KL(||M)+KL(B||M) ))

title: Jensen-Shannon divergence — distJSD
Jensen-Shannon divergence — distJSD
text: inMatrix positive-valued numeric matrix.

title: SpEED matrix by accounting for the weighted coordinate variables — speedmat.coord

title: SpEED matrix by accounting for the weighted coordinate variables — speedmat.coord
text: data sf object. include outcome, treatment, coordinates formula formula. y ~ x form. outcome character(1). Outcome variable name. Default 'outcome' treatment character(1). Treatment variable name. Default 'treatment' coords character(2). Names columns x- y-dimension coordinates. coords_factor numeric(1). Coordinate weights standardization.

title: SpEED matrix by accounting for the weighted coordinate variables — speedmat.coord
text: Insang Song (sigmafelix@hotmail.com)

what: SpEED matrix for matching analysis — speedmat
title: SpEED matrix for matching analysis — speedmat
text: Returns spatially enhanced entropy-derived matrix (SpEED)  matching analysis

title: SpEED matrix for matching analysis — speedmat
code: speedmat(   data,   formula,   outcome = "outcome",   treatment = "treatment",   mode_speed = "product",   coords = NULL,   coords_factor = NULL,   caliper_s = NULL,   caliper_jsd = NULL,   scale = FALSE )

title: SpEED matrix for matching analysis — speedmat
text: data sf object. include outcome, treatment, coordinates (speed_mode == "coord") formula formula. y ~ x form. outcome character(1). Outcome variable name. Default 'outcome' treatment character(1). Treatment variable name. Default 'treatment' mode_speed character(1). One 'product' (JSD%*%D) 'coord' (JSD(cbind(covariates, X, Y))) coords character(2). Names columns x- y-dimension coordinates. valid mode_speed=='coord' coords_factor numeric(1). Coordinate weights standardization. valid mode_speed=='coord' caliper_s numeric(1). Caliper distance caliper_jsd numeric(1). Caliper divergence value scale logical(1). Min-max scaling distance divergence, resulting range [0,1]

title: SpEED matrix for matching analysis — speedmat
text: Insang Song (sigmafelix@hotmail.com)

text: Returns SpEED matrix, product  Jensen-Shannon divergence geographic distance matrix

title: SpEED matrix by multiplying Jensen-Shannon divergence and geodesic distance (in km) — speedmat.jsdist
code: speedmat.jsdist(   data,   formula,   outcome = "outcome",   treatment = "treatment",   caliper_s = NULL,   caliper_jsd = NULL,   scale = FALSE,   zero_adjust = 1 )

title: SpEED matrix by multiplying Jensen-Shannon divergence and geodesic distance (in km) — speedmat.jsdist
text: data sf object. include outcome, treatment, coordinates formula formula. y ~ x form. outcome character(1). Outcome variable name. default 'outcome' treatment character(1). Treatment variable name. Default 'treatment' caliper_s numeric(1). Caliper distance caliper_jsd numeric(1). Caliper divergence value scale logical(1). Min-max scaling distance divergence, resulting range [0,1] zero_adjust numeric(1). minimum min-max scaling. avoiding zeros divergence computation.

title: SpEED matrix by multiplying Jensen-Shannon divergence and geodesic distance (in km) — speedmat.jsdist
